name: Neon City
description: Neon City is an urban sprawl where the shadows of the past meet the lights of the future. The city is illuminated with neon lights that create a mesmerising, almost hypnotic ambiance. Skyscrapers tower above, framing the sky with their silhouettes, while traffic buzzes on the streets below. Food vendors line the streets, serving a variety of cuisines to appease every palate - from quick synth-food to elaborate delicacies prepared the old-world way.
